mapper.insert: insert into temp_tb (temp_buDate, temp_backUpData, temp_docId, temp_checkLast) values (#{buDate}, #{backUpData}, #{docId}, test_seq.NEXTVAL)
mapper.select: select temp_buDate buDate, temp_backUpData backUpData, temp_docId docId, temp_checkLast checkLast from temp_tb where temp_docId=#{docId}
select temp_buDate buDate, temp_backUpData backUpData, temp_docId docId, temp_checkLast checkLast from temp_tb where temp_docId=#{docId}
